  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">SPORTS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPORT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPORTS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ESPORTES</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPORT</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ΑΘΛΗΤΙΣΜΟΣ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">DEPORTES</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">tthe pupils have to create an ID card for 6 different basketball players They have to get the information from the Internet and download pictures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sports</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tthe Pupillen müssen eine Identifikation Karte 
für 6 unterschiedliche Basketballspieler herstellen, die sie die 
Informationen vom Internet erhalten und Abbildungen downloaden 
müssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les pupilles de tthe doivent créer une carte 
d'identification pour 6 joueurs de basket-ball différents qu'elles 
doivent obtenir l'information de l'Internet et télécharger des 
images.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as pupilas do tthe têm que criar um cartão do ID
para 6 jogadores que de basketball diferentes têm que começar a 
informação do Internet e download retratos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le pupille del tthe devono creare una scheda di 
identificazione per 6 giocatori che di pallacanestro differenti devono
ottenere le informazioni dal Internet e trasferire le immagini dal 
sistema centrale verso i satelliti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">tthe οι μαθητές πρέπει να δημιουργήσουν μια κάρτα 
ταυτότητας για 6 διαφορετικούς φορείς καλαθοσφαίρισης που πρέπει 
να πάρουν τις πληροφορίες από το Διαδίκτυο και να μεταφορτώσουν 
τις εικόνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las pupilas del tthe tienen que crear una tarjeta 
de la identificación para 6 diversos jugadores de baloncesto que 
tienen que conseguir la información del Internet y descargar cuadros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sports</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
